location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MOUTH OF THE EUPHRATES SHATT AL ARAB AND BAHMISHIR RIVER'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper with manuscript additions in coloured inkDimensions: 910 x 645mm, on sheet 1020 x 673mm

mods.abstract: A map indicating the locations of four conical buoys and three cask buoys at the mouth of the Shatt Al Arab River. The buoys are marked in manuscript with corresponding arrows drawn in the right margin.The base map on which the buoys are indicated is Admiralty chart 1235, 'Re-published at the Admiralty 30th. Sept. 1898', 'Large corrections... Mar. 1907.'.A hand stamp on the verso reads, 'British India Steam Navigation Co. Ltd. Received 19 Aug. 1908'.
